title: BanG Dream! - Tsubuyaki / Tweet (doujinshi)
description:
For Girls who dream of yuri
Thanks to Girls who dream of yuri
For the sake of Girls who dream of yuri
A manga of dream to yuri.

Compilation of 25 characters (+α) Dream Manga +
A story of Shirasagi-san getting moved by "just a manager".
